item.description:
Raw food is always about love, but let's see what we can come up with for a special LOVE themed potluck!

Bring a raw vegan dish to share for our RAW-licious potluck!  Your dish should serve 6-8 people & please try to use as much local & organic ingredients as you can!

We host a monthly potluck, on the 3rd Sunday of the month, so put it in your calendar & come join the fun!

Looking forward to seeing you soon!  :-)

group.name: Raw Maine: The Way Food Should Be!

item.name: February Raw Vegan Potluck: LOVE THEME
